room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Manor in Panama City
review: Escape manor's "Asylum" room is so much fun! Definitely going back to escape from a different room! Money well spent.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Manor in Panama City
review: Had an excellent day in the Asylum. It was HARD to figure everything out. Super fun and challenging. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Manor in Panama City
review: The staff was great and made us feel super pumped to be there! The Asylum was fun and had the right amount of stumps to challenge you. Great place to spend time with friends and learn some teamwork!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Manor in Panama City
review: This was the best one I have done. It was well decorated and had great mysteries and an awesome story. I loved it. Everyone has to try it.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Manor in Panama City
review: This is the third location I've done an escape room at, and it was by far the best. If you're on the fence and considering it, I would strongly urge you to take a leap & give it a try. Everyone from my fianc√©, to friends, and even my mother has loved it. I can't recommend it enough.
